locality.description: Locality (incorporated city or town) where this group typically meets in-person, or 'Online' if the group doesn't meet in-person

addedDate.description: Date the group was added to this list, intended to help people find new groups (ISO 8601 format)

description.description: A brief description of the group

tla.description: Optional acronym used by the group, e.g. Boise Software Developers Group members always call themselves BSDG.

url.description: URL providing more information about the group, and ideally about the next meeting time & place

meetupComGroupName.description: If meetup.com is used for scheduling, the meetup.com group name (seen in URLs as https://www.meetup.com/<group name>/

facebookGroupName.description: If Facebook public groups are used for scheduling, the Facebook group name

eventbriteOrganizerId.description: If eventbrite.com is used for scheduling, the Eventbrite organizer ID (typically a number?)

iCalendarUrl.description: If a generic web calendar is used for scheduling, its iCalendar/RFC5545 URL (e.g. the .ical URLs provided for public Google Calendars)
